lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about the Miami Dolphins’ early signing of the first pick for this weekend’s N.F.L. draft referred incorrectly to the St. Louis Rams, the next team slated to pick. The Rams must wait until the draft begins to negotiate and sign a player; they are not free to do so now. (Only the team with the first draft choice has that right, although the league intends to re-evaluate the rule after this year’s draft.).
